mapper.select: SELECT b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_content, b_regdate, b_readcnt, b_refno, b_depth, b_category, b_order FROM BOARD WHERE b_no=#{b_no}

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT b_no ,b_title ,b_writer ,b_regdate ,b_content ,b_readcnt ,b_refno ,b_depth ,b_category ,CAST(LPAD(b_no, 10, 0) AS CHAR(3000)) path ,b_order FROM board WHERE b_refno = 0 UNION ALL SELECT b.b_no ,b.b_title ,b.b_writer ,b.b_regdate ,b.b_content ,b.b_readcnt ,b.b_refno ,b.b_depth ,b.b_category ,CONCAT(a.path, ',', b.b_no) AS path ,b.b_order FROM CTE a INNER JOIN board b ON a.b_no = b.b_refno )
SELECT b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_regdate, b_content, b_readcnt, b_refno, b_depth, path, b_order FROM CTE WHERE 1 = 1
AND b_writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND b_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND b_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND ( b_writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR b_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR b_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY b_order DESC, path ASC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
